title: Asqatasun
creator: Asqatasun.org
description:
Asqatasun is the fork of Tanaguru by its creators. It provides a truly open and documented environment for websites analysis, applied to web accessibility or SEO.
Asqatasun provides a huge level of automation and deals with Continuous Integration thanks to its Jenkins Plugin and Docker image.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr lang="fr" title="Référentiel Général d’Accessibilité pour les Administrations">RGAA</abbr>, French government standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
